page.title: 07FAMILY LIFE IN SALISBURY
page.content: {My name is Tracy.}My parents' names are Rosalind and John. I have three pets. My dad is a self-employed building labourer and plumber. My dad's hobby is darts, my mum's are gardening and puzzles. Dad grumbles when she does puzzles. My Nan's name is Phyllis. Grandad does not work but he likes gardening. I live in a terrace house with two bedrooms, a living room, a bathroom, kitchen and dining-room. {My name is Sallie.}My mum's name is Anne and her boyfriend's name is Tom. My goldfish' names are Pinky and Perky. My bird's name is Max. My mum likes playing darts, riding bicycles and running. My mum went to St Edmunds School. I am going there soon. My home sweet home is a three bedroomed flat. I am ten and a half years old. My mum is twenty-seven and Tom is twenty.
